item.description:
hello,

Here is a Seminar that will make a difference!

Purification of the Soul: Our soul is composed of the essence of our experiences in our lives. Various negative emotions that we have indulged such as anger, resentment, hatred, fear, jealousy, and lusts are stored in the soul. This causes an eclipse of our divine nature. When this happens over time, our soul has the appearance of mud covering over the bright light of the Sun.

friday April, 20th @ 7:30pm
cost $25i
f you are from this meetup it will be $15



In Light,
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: The Purification of the Soul
